Reviews.Title: kodak easyshare m23
Reviews.Author: LZC74
Reviews.Content: MY ORDER ARRIVED ON TIME. IT'S A NEAT CAMERA THAT TAKES GREAT PICTURES. MY PACKAGE ARRIVED INTACT, NO DAMAGE TO BOX. THANKS FOR HAVING THIS ITEM FOR ME TO PURCHASE AT A GREAT PRICE.

Reviews.Title: Camera was good but it was used!
Reviews.Author: Elyse Collins
Reviews.Content: I was sent a used camera! I ordered new and they sent me a used camera in an open box.

Reviews.Title: Really like it
Reviews.Author: Ella & Remington's Mom "Lavada S. Wright"
Reviews.Content: Seems to be a very good camera and is easy to use! Can't wait to have more photo memories created!

Reviews.Title: Small and Slow
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: I broke a 10 MP Kodak camera, but found it to be very good. I thought this would be a good replacement since it has 14 MP and it shares the similar traits as the previous one. However, this one is slower: shutter speed, deleting photos, etc. Slow and small! My 10 MP camera was slightly bigger than this one. It seems more like a novelty toy camera instead of something you can depend on long term.

ProductInfo.Name: Kodak EasyShare M23 14 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Black)
